title: How to upload my audio track to SoundCloud - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, if you got a music marketing tool AIOStream, you can use it to schedule a task to auto upload a lot of songs to your SoundCould. Play the songs/albums/playlists like a real human, you can let the program bulk-play, set the playback time, play times, delay time, paly mode like 'play-pause-play ...' , cycle playback and schedule play etc.... You can let it play using different ip/proxy and accounts. This software can manage multiple accounts to upload, play, follow, share, comment and like a batch of songs, lists and users etc. Besides, it can also work on many other music sites: Spotify, Napster, Deezer, iHeartRadio and Pandora.
When you login to Soundcloud there will be an upload option at the top of the screen
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Donalda A. McCarthy
